name: Mimick
description:
You're lost in a vivid food-induced coma full of strange creatures, rune stones, hungry ghosts, and of course the food that got you in this mess.

Submission for the Wild Godot Jam #43; theme Combine + The More The Merrier & Roll With It wild cards.

  • Combine: You combine with the creatures you encounter and mimic their special abilities
  • The More The Merrier: Creatures follow you after you feed them
  •  Roll With It: Creatures and Ghosts move randomly, which sometimes works in your favor, but usually doesn't.

KNOWN BUGS 🐛

This game was made fast, and leaves a lot to be desired. Known issues:

  • Ghosts can become stuck in one place, making it impossible to collect food or navigate. Fix by reloading. Unfortunately this also restarts the game :(
  • Jumps randomly have enormous force. This bug is very rare.

CREDITS 👾

Art + Code: this very sleepy Kook

Font: 

  • Endear-Regular by Jeron Aguinaldo https://www.1001freefonts.com/endear.font
